QuestData.Title: Twilight Extermination
QuestData.Description: NOW, TAKE... THE ATTUNED RUNESTONE... AND USE... IT TO POSSESS... ONE OF... THE BOUND TORRENTS... AT... THE CENTRAL TEMPLE. THEY WILL IGNORE... YOU. YOU ARE BENEATH... THEIR NOTICE.$B$BUSE... THE ELEMENTAL'S POWERS... TO DESTROY... THE TWILIGHT DEVOTEES... AND... THEIR... FACELESS OVERSEERS.
QuestData.LogDescription: Possess a Bound Torrent and then slay 50 Twilight Devotees and 10 Faceless Overseers.
QuestData.RewardText: THEIR DEVOTIONS ARE... SILENCED.$B$BNOW THAT... YOU HAVE... THEIR POWER... YOU MUST DESTROY... THEIR LEADER.
